00011 static pthread_mutex_t CanFestival_mutex = PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;
00012 
00013 static struct timeval last_sig;
00014 
00015 static timer_t timer;
00016 
00017 void TimerCleanup(void)
00018 {
00019         /* only used in realtime apps */
00020 }
00021 
00022 void EnterMutex(void)
00023 {
00024         if(pthread_mutex_lock(&CanFestival_mutex)) {
00025                 fprintf(stderr, "pthread_mutex_lock() failed\n");
00026         }
00027 }
00028 
00029 void LeaveMutex(void)
00030 {
00031         if(pthread_mutex_unlock(&CanFestival_mutex)) {
00032                 fprintf(stderr, "pthread_mutex_unlock() failed\n");
00033         }
00034 }
00035 
00036 void timer_notify(sigval_t val)
00037 {
00038         if(gettimeofday(&last_sig,NULL)) {
00039                 perror("gettimeofday()");
00040         }
00041         EnterMutex();
00042         TimeDispatch();
00043         LeaveMutex();
00044 //      printf("getCurrentTime() return=%u\n", p.tv_usec);
00045 }
00046 
00047 void TimerInit(void)
00048 {
00049         struct sigevent sigev;
00050 
00051         // Take first absolute time ref.
00052         if(gettimeofday(&last_sig,NULL)){
00053                 perror("gettimeofday()");
00054         }
00055 
00056 #if defined(__UCLIBC__)
00057         int ret;
00058         ret = timer_create(CLOCK_PROCESS_CPUTIME_ID, NULL, &timer);
00059         signal(SIGALRM, timer_notify);
00060 #else
00061         memset (&sigev, 0, sizeof (struct sigevent));
00062         sigev.sigev_value.sival_int = 0;
00063         sigev.sigev_notify = SIGEV_THREAD;
00064         sigev.sigev_notify_attributes = NULL;
00065         sigev.sigev_notify_function = timer_notify;
00066 
00067         if(timer_create (CLOCK_REALTIME, &sigev, &timer)) {
00068                 perror("timer_create()");
00069         }
00070 #endif
00071 }
00072 
00073 void StopTimerLoop(TimerCallback_t exitfunction)
00074 {
00075         EnterMutex();
00076         if(timer_delete (timer)) {
00077                 perror("timer_delete()");
00078         }
00079         exitfunction(NULL,0);
00080         LeaveMutex();
00081 }
00082 
00083 void StartTimerLoop(TimerCallback_t init_callback)
00084 {
00085         EnterMutex();
00086         // At first, TimeDispatch will call init_callback.
00087         SetAlarm(NULL, 0, init_callback, 0, 0);
00088         LeaveMutex();
00089 }
00090 
00091 void canReceiveLoop_signal(int sig)
00092 {
00093 }
00094 /* We assume that ReceiveLoop_task_proc is always the same */
00095 static void (*unixtimer_ReceiveLoop_task_proc)(CAN_PORT) = NULL;
00096 
00101 void* unixtimer_canReceiveLoop(void* port)
00102 {
00103     /*get signal*/
00104     if(signal(SIGTERM, canReceiveLoop_signal) == SIG_ERR) {
00105                 perror("signal()");
00106         }
00107     unixtimer_ReceiveLoop_task_proc((CAN_PORT)port);
00108 
00109     return NULL;
00110 }
00111 
00112 void CreateReceiveTask(CAN_PORT port, TASK_HANDLE* Thread, void* ReceiveLoopPtr)
00113 {
00114     unixtimer_ReceiveLoop_task_proc = ReceiveLoopPtr;
00115         if(pthread_create(Thread, NULL, unixtimer_canReceiveLoop, (void*)port)) {
00116                 perror("pthread_create()");
00117         }
00118 }
00119 
00120 void WaitReceiveTaskEnd(TASK_HANDLE *Thread)
00121 {
00122         if(pthread_kill(*Thread, SIGTERM)) {
00123                 perror("pthread_kill()");
00124         }
00125         if(pthread_join(*Thread, NULL)) {
00126                 perror("pthread_join()");
00127         }
00128 }

00130 #define maxval(a,b) ((a>b)?a:b)
00131 void setTimer(TIMEVAL value)
00132 {
00133 //      printf("setTimer(TIMEVAL value=%d)\n", value);
00134         // TIMEVAL is us whereas setitimer wants ns...
00135         long tv_nsec = 1000 * (maxval(value,1)%1000000);
00136         time_t tv_sec = value/1000000;
00137         struct itimerspec timerValues;
00138         timerValues.it_value.tv_sec = tv_sec;
00139         timerValues.it_value.tv_nsec = tv_nsec;
00140         timerValues.it_interval.tv_sec = 0;
00141         timerValues.it_interval.tv_nsec = 0;
00142 
00143         timer_settime (timer, 0, &timerValues, NULL);
00144 }
00145 
00146 TIMEVAL getElapsedTime(void)
00147 {
00148         struct timeval p;
00149         if(gettimeofday(&p,NULL)) {
00150                 perror("gettimeofday()");
00151         }
00152 //      printf("getCurrentTime() return=%u\n", p.tv_usec);
00153         return (p.tv_sec - last_sig.tv_sec)* 1000000 + p.tv_usec - last_sig.tv_usec;
00154 }
